string-array.name: notify_texts
string-array.item: It is time to get to work now.The best of plank is waiting for you.
Hey! Do not second-guess to start the plank workout right now.
Planks remind you not to miss today’s workout. Let’s go!
Hello!!! Remember to sweat today with planks and don’t miss it.
Plank workout CANNOT be missed. Get to it right now.
If you are determined to get what you want remember to workout today.
Time is running, plank is coming. Do not miss the workout today.
It’s time for some workout with planks app. Let’s stay fit.
Warning from plank! Don’t forget the workout of the day.
Get closer today to your perfect body with planks. It’s just the time.
